name: Room of Pandora (Free Version)
description:
Room of Pandora is a open-ended physics-based third person puzzle and exploration game. Your goal is to escape the room by solving puzzles with nothing but your brain and physics.

This is demo version of Room of Pandora, including 9 rooms+2 ending and 1 secret room. If you like my game, you may download full version on steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1065230/Room_of_Pandora/
